about_the_game:
Gravity Force puts you into the seat of a drone pilot. Steer your spaceship through narrow caves (2.5D) to fulfill your job: locate and retrieve cargo crates without wrecking the ship.

Parts of the gameplay are closely related to vintage classics like Asteroids, Thrust or - you guessed it - Gravity Force, but with way more realistic physics.
The minimalistic controls and realistic physics are easy to learn, but sometimes hard to master.

Play some relaxed missions just for fun, encounter nasty difficulties, or play highly competitive against other players' highscore / ghost. It's up to you.

This is the DEMO version of the full game. For a lot more Missions, Races and other stuff check out the full version of Gravity Force!
